DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine response rate patient advanced gastric cancer treat high-dose fluorouracil ( 5-FU ) v without high-dose leucovorin ( CF ) vs high-dose 5-FU/CF/cisplatin . II . Determine toxic effect regimens patient . III . Assess symptomatic improvement patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord participate center , WHO performance status ( 0 1 v 2 ) , disease stage ( metastatic v locally advance ) . Patients randomize 1 3 treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive fluorouracil ( 5-FU ) IV 24 hour weekly 6 week . Arm II : Patients receive leucovorin calcium ( CF ) IV 2 hour follow 5-FU IV 24 hour weekly 6 week . Arm III : Patients receive CF 5-FU arm II cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1 , 15 , 29 . Treatment repeat every 7 week maximum 4 course absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression . Patients follow every 8 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 65-135 patient ( 21-45 per arm ) accrue study .
